title: 数据模型层 - Student/CourseClass/ScoreRecord/KnowledgePoint
description: 创建数据分析所需的核心数据模型，为个人分析和班级分析提供数据基础
requirements: Student模型: id, name, classId, studentNo, avatar(可选)
CourseClass模型: id, name, teacherId, studentCount, grade
ScoreRecord模型: studentId, subject, score, date, knowledgePoint, examType
KnowledgePoint模型: name, masteryRate(0-100), questionCount, category
所有模型支持JSON序列化/反序列化
acceptance_criteria: 所有模型类可正常编译
